verses.text: Now these are the names[H8034] of the children[H1121] of Israel,[H3478] which came[H935] into Egypt;[H4714] every man[H376] and his household[H1004] came[H935] with Jacob.

Now when Pharaoh[H6547] heard[H8085] this thing,[H1697] he sought[H1245] to slay[H2026] Moses.[H4872] But Moses[H4872] fled[H1272] from the face[H6440] of Pharaoh,[H6547] and dwelt[H3427] in the land[H776] of Midian:[H4080] and he sat down[H3427] by a well.

And when they came[H935] to Reuel[H7467] their father,[H1] he said,[H559] How[H4069] is it that ye are come[H935] so soon[H4116] to day?

And he said[H559] unto his daughters,[H1323] And where is he? why is it that ye have left[H5800] the man?[H376] call[H7121] him, that he may eat[H398] bread.

And it came to pass in process[H1992][H7227] of time,[H3117] that the king[H4428] of Egypt[H4714] died:[H4191] and the children[H1121] of Israel[H3478] sighed[H584] by reason of[H4480] the bondage,[H5656] and they cried,[H2199] and their cry[H7775] came up[H5927] unto God[H430] by reason of the bondage.

And God[H430] looked[H7200] upon the children[H1121] of Israel,[H3478] and God[H430] had respect
